name: Flopping Fish Cat Toy
description:
Self Moving
The FIRST Flopping Fish Cat Toy that moves on its own!

Battery Powered
Easy USB recharging - NO more wasting batteries!

Refillable Catnip Pouch
Cat safe velcro pocket is easy to refill over and over again!

Looks Exactly like a Fish!
The resemblance will surprise you!

XL SIZE!
Length: 30cm.

SOFT & CUDDLY!
Made of Plush and Cotton.

FOUR VARIANTS AVAILABLE!
Gerald, Ronald, Bill & George Floppy Fish Cat Toys

This Floppy Fish Cat Toy will keep your kitty entertained for hours with its wagging and dancing moves. Easy USB rechargeable and motion activated so cats can make it start flipping on its own. After moving for a while the Flopping Fish Cat Toy stops to save battery life when cats stop playing with it so you don't need to worry about turning it off. Refillable catnip pouch pocket and 4 variants available. Don't miss out! Spoil your kitty with our Flippity Floppity Fish!

Refillable catnip pouch pocket. 4 variants available. 25% Off and Free Shiping today.

Special offer: BUY 2 FISHIES AND GET 25% OFF the second unit!

Quantity Discounted Prices:

1 X Flopping Fish Cat Toy = $24.99 

2 X Flopping Fish Cat Toy = $43.7 (SAVE $6.25)

3 X Flopping Fish Cat Toy = $59.99 (SAVE $15)

To access this promo just add the fishies you want to your CART and you'll get discounted prices when checking out!

name: Banana Cat Bed
description:
Your cat will, literally, go BANANAS over this bed. It's the perfect bed for YOUR KITTY! It will be its own soft, cozy & comfy spot.

The Banana Cat Bed features a peelable banana peel that allows your cat to sneak in and out while still having the privacy they require. Just peel open the top layer of the peel to sneak a peek at your kitty snoozing inside.

Tons of fun, guaranteed!

Kittenfy's Banana Cat Bed is available in 3 different colors and 3 different sizes for you to choose the perfect fit.
